text: A Test of Love is a 1958 Chinese Yue opera film directed by Huang Zumo and starring Fu Quanxiang, Lu Jinhua, and other performers of the Shanghai Yue Opera House. The script of the film, as well as that of the stage production on which the film is based, was written by Tian Han with his wife An E and based on the Wang Kui Betrays Guiying legend from the Song dynasty. ==References== * Category:Chinese-language opera films Category:Films set in the Song dynasty Category:Chinese black-and-white films Category:Chinese films Category:Films set in Shandong Category:Films set in Kaifeng Category:1958 films Category:Films directed by Huang Zumo
title: A Test of Love (1958 film)
